entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A lightweight fetching library packed with essential features - retries, interceptors, request deduplication and much more, all while still retaining a similar API surface with regular Fetch.

entry.title: Prathamesh-Maskar22/InventoryEase: InventoryEase is a lightweight and user-friendly product management system built with React and Node.js. It allows users to easily add, view, update, and manage product details such as name, price, and barcode.
entry.content: InventoryEase is a lightweight and user-friendly product management system built with React and Node.js. It allows users to easily add, view, update, and manage product details such as name, price, and barcode.

entry.title: Arunsp03/Code-Judge: A lightweight online coding platform inspired by LeetCode and Codeforces. Users can pick a problem and write solutions in Python or JavaScript, which are then executed securely using the Judge0 API.
entry.content: A lightweight online coding platform inspired by LeetCode and Codeforces. Users can pick a problem and write solutions in Python or JavaScript, which are then executed securely using the Judge0 API.

entry.title: Rainymy/linguist-sense: Lightweight JavaScript wrapper for GitHub Linguist’s language detection. Detects programming languages via file extensions and file content using Linguist’s official language definitions.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: ismail9k/vue3-carousel: A highly customizable, lightweight Vue 3 carousel component for your next awesome project.
entry.content: A highly customizable, lightweight Vue 3 carousel component for your next awesome project.

entry.title: Kiansa/cloud-storage: A lightweight, self-hosted cloud storage solution for managing files and directories on your own server. Provides a REST API for seamless file operations, including GET, UPDATE, and DELETE for files and directories. Ideal for developers seeking a customizable, secure, and scalable storage backend.
entry.content: A lightweight, self-hosted cloud storage solution for managing files and directories on your own server. Provides a REST API for seamless file operations, including GET, UPDATE, and DELETE for files and directories. Ideal for developers seeking a customizable, secure, and scalable storage backend.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
